Package testing

Class ControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • testing.ControllerTest

  • public class ControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the test class for Controller. It implements both JUnit 4 and Mockito 2.11. It "mocks" the dependency object in the controller so I can verify it's calling the proper methods inside of the Model class.
    Version:
    1.9

      void bankPointsTest​()
      This test verifies that the proper methods were called in our UILogic class by the bankPoints method in the controller.
      void rollTheDiceButtonPushedTest​()
      This test determines whether or not the rollDice method used to capture ActionEvents is actually able to roll the dice.

      Initializes our sterile JavaFX thread and runtime environment.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public static void setUp​()
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Initializes our sterile JavaFX thread and runtime environment.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If an internal exception occurs within the JavaFX application thread.

      • rollTheDiceButtonPushedTest

        public void rollTheDiceButtonPushedTest​()
        This test determines whether or not the rollDice method used to capture ActionEvents is actually able to roll the dice. It verifies that the rollCount variable in Model is incremented (thus, it's calling all of the methods in the class).

      • bankPointsTest

        public void bankPointsTest​()
        This test verifies that the proper methods were called in our UILogic class by the bankPoints method in the controller.

      • setUpTest

        public void setUpTest​()
        This test determines if we're properly loading the rectangles into the rectangles array. It verifies that the size of the rectangle array is correct.
